structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Notice of application for creation of district.
law.text: When seventy percent (70%) of those qualified within the boundary fixed by the secretary are found to have petitioned for the establishment of a flood control district, and the secretary has established the boundaries thereof, the secretary shall give notice of the application for the creation of the district by publication pursuant to KRS Chapter 424.
law.history: Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 115. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 42, sec. 9.
